#summary highlight(text,phrases[highlighter])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

_*Note:* This wiki contains "bleeding edge" documentation, which may reflect a future version of Wheels. Entries in the wiki may also be incomplete and unedited. For the "official" documentation, please visit [http://www.cfwheels.com/docs Official ColdFusion on Wheels Documentation]._

*Description*:

Highlights the phrase(s) everywhere in the text if found by wrapping it in a strong tag (by default).

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || gument name= ||
|| *highlighter* || string || false || <strong class= || gument name= ||
|| *phrases* || string || true ||  || gument name= ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#highlight(text="You searched for: Wheels", phrases="Wheels")#
-> You searched for: <strong class="highlight">Wheels</strong>


}}}
